name: time_lapse
description: Timelapse app to keep a record of changing people or environments

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: @Jon-Ledo, @Samdemarco, @Kay-Annn, @Hpyorange, @mbenitez1607
